column4: hello i tried to install the newest nvidia driver and now it says failed to intialize the nvidia kernel module
can you log in to your machine with GUI?
first back up your /etc/X11/xorg.conf  file then edit and place a "#" in the lines that start with "Driver" and "option" under the section "Device" , save the file then hit control-backspace
ok now what how do i get the new driver installed
